Title: Daily contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by daily auction or a daily transmission allocation procedure.

Title: Weekly contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by weekly auction or a weekly transmission allocation procedure.

Title: Monthly contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by monthly auction or a monthly transmission allocation procedure.

Title: Yearly contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by yearly auction or a yearly transmission allocation procedure.

Title: Total contract
Description: This is the sum of all capacity contract types for the period covered.

Title: Long term contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by long term trade agreements according to European regulations (EU Directive 1228/2003).

Title: Intraday contract
Description: The condition under which the capacity is allocated and handled is through an intraday auction and allocation process.

Title: Quarter yearly contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by quarter yearly auction or a quarter yearly transmission allocation procedure.

Title: Semestrial contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by half yearly auction or a half yearly transmission allocation procedure.

Title: Multiple year contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by multiple year auctions.

Title: Intraday balancing mechanism contract
Description: The condition under which the capacity is allocated and handled is through intraday energy balancing services.

Title: Historical contract
Description: A Contract established before the EU directive that are valid until the term of the contract.

Title: Hourly contract
Description: The condition under which capacity is allocated and handled is by hourly auctions.
